Description.Text: Clarion Grandhotel Zlaty Lev is an historic 4-star hotel promising stylish accommodation and great facilities, in the heart of Leberec. Highlights include a whirlpool and free Wi-Fi. Located in the city centre, close to several tram stops, the hotel affords quick and easy access to the many attractions. Guests are within walking distance of a pleasing architectural heritage that encompasses Jested tower, the town hall and a 17th-century castle. Other sights include the Botanical Garden, F X Saldy theatre and North Bohemian Museum. The hotel occupies a striking property completed in 1906, set beside a cobbled street and picturesque park. Facilities include a whirlpool, sauna, and spa offering a range of beauty and massage treatments. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. The Benada restaurant offers regional and international specialties in a charming setting complete with wood panelling. The bar serves a wide selection of hot and cold beverages. Standard rooms are spacious and tastefully designed, featuring a classic decor, rich colour scheme and dark wood furniture. Amenities include a mini-bar, telephone, free wired internet and en-suite bathroom. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
